dmca.title: [ABUSE] Trademark/Copyright Infringement of UnqiueHomeStore.Com]
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page Leg4is.be of the material that you claim is
being infringed as of 2:06:32 p.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of The Planet
Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Monday, June 05, 2006 11:32 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark/Copyright Infringement of UnqiueHomeStore.Com]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Trademark/Copyright Infringement of UnqiueHomeStore.Com]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the address
of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Trademark/Copyright Infringement of UnqiueHomeStore.Com
Date:         Mon, 5 Jun 2006 12:23:22 -0400
From:         Balboni, Jeff <Jeff.Balboni@FMR.COM>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>




I am the President of AlphaBits Corp.

We own and operate UniqueHomeStore.Com.  We are tracking an individual or business
that is setting up malicious websites that contain references to our site. We
believe that this person is either one of our competitors or a Search Engine
Optimization (SEO) Firm. IN any case the site

Leg4is.be is using trademarked and copyrighted information from our site. We would
like this shutdown immediately and all contact information from this site sent to us
so that we can forward it to our lawyer. A copy of the web page is below along with
the url.


Jeff Balboni  (508) 776-9922
Legal@UniqueHomeStore.Com

AlphaBits Children's Boutique
194 Route 6a
Yarmouthport, Ma 02675






+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
